_DO_NOT_EDIT.description: This file is auto generated with po2chrome-messages tool from it.po.

connecting_host_app.description: Shown to user when Web extension sent request to native host messaging application and waiting for result.

error_extension_response.description: Shown to user when response of extension API call does not follow known format.

extension_enabled.description: Used as title, eg in table header. Means 'Does GNOME Shell extension enabled?'

extension_installed.description: Used as title, eg in table header. Means 'Does GNOME Shell extension installed?'

extension_name.description: Used as title, eg in table header. Means 'GNOME Shell extension name'.

extension_status_downgrade.description: This is a part of phrase like 'Extension Top Icons must be downgraded'.

extension_status_upgrade.description: This is a part of phrase like 'Extension Top Icons can be upgraded'.

extension_synchronized.description: Used as title, eg in table header. Means 'Does GNOME Shell extension status synchronized with remote browser storage?'

gs_chrome.description: This is a project title. Used as extension name in Chrome Store and in some titlebars.

hours.description: This is a part of phrase 'Update check period: xx hours'

manifest_description.description: Used as extension description in Chrome Store
manifest_description.message: Questa estensione fornisce l'integrazione con GNOME Shell e il corrispondente repository delle estensioni https://extensions.gnome.org

native_request_failed.description: $REQUEST$ is a placeholder for technical name of request that web extension make via native messaging host application.

network_error.message: Si è verificato un errore di rete. Verificare la connessione Internet e/o le impostazioni del proxy.

never.description: This is a part of phrase 'Last check: never'

no_host_connector.message: Anche se l'estensione «Integrazione con GNOME Shell» è in esecuzione, il connettore host nativo non è rilevato. Fare riferimento alla documentazione per istruzioni sull'installazione del connettore.

no_host_response.description: Means 'Web extension does not received answer from native messaging host application.'

older_connector.description: Part of phrase eg 'You are using different versions of GNOME Shell integration extension (version 5) and native host connector (older than version 4)'.

options_check_period.description: Option name. Allow to set interval between GNOME Shell extensions update checks.

options_last_check.description: This is a start of phrase (followed by date/time) of last GNOME Shell extensions update check.

options_next_check.description: This is a start of phrase (followed by date/time) of next GNOME Shell extensions update check.

options_saved.description: Means 'Options were saved successfully after user clicked Save button'

options_show_network_errors.description: Option name. By default Chrome do not reveal exact network error in case of request failure. Allow enable/disable extended error information.
options_show_network_errors.message: Mostrare informazioni sugli errori della rete

options_show_network_errors_notice.description: This is a notice under option name. Warns user that additional browser permission is required if option will be enabled.

options_show_release_notes.description: Option name. Allow to enable/disable popup with release notes when Web extension is updated.
options_show_release_notes.message: Mostrare le note di rilascio quando l'estensione è aggiornata

options_synchronize_extensions.description: Option name. Allow to enable/disable synchronization of GNOME Shell extensions with remote browser storage.

options_synchronize_extensions_notice.description: This is a notice under option name.
options_synchronize_extensions_notice.message: Se abilitata, l'elenco delle estensioni di GNOME Shell sarà sincronizzato con l'account Google.

options_title.description: $GS_CHROME$ is placeholder for 'GNOME Shell integration' string. This string used as title for Options page. This title is not shown in Chrome, but may be shown in other browsers.

options_update_check.description: Option name. Allow enable/disable update check for GNOME Shell extensions.

platform_not_supported.message: Il connettore host nativo non è supportato da questa piattaforma.

synchronization.description: Link name for synchronization tab in options dialog.

synchronization_failed.description: $CAUSE$ is placeholder for error that caused synchronization failure.

synchronization_storage_exists.message: Lo spazio di archiviazione della sincronizzazione remota contiene già l'elenco delle estensioni.

synchronization_use_local.message: Usare l'elenco locale delle estensioni, sovrascrivere quello remoto.

synchronization_use_remote.message: Usare l'elenco remoto delle estensioni, sovrascrivere quello locale.

translation_credits.description: This is content of 'About translation' tab in Options dialog. Thank you for translation and feel free to add yourself here. HTML markup enabled for this string.

translation_credits_title.description: Link name for translation credits tab in options dialog.

unknown_error.description: This should newer be shown to user. However better safe than sorry.

update_available.message: È disponibile un aggiornamento delle estensioni di GNOME Shell

update_check_failed.description: $CAUSE$ is placeholder for error that caused update failure.
update_check_failed.message: Verifica dell'aggiornamento delle estensioni non riuscita: $CAUSE$

version.description: Part of phrase eg 'GNOME Shell integration extension (version 5)'

warning_versions_mismatch.message: Si sta usando differenti versioni dell'estensione di integrazione di GNOME Shell ($$1) e del connettore host nativo ($$2). Alcune funzionalità potrebbero non funzionare o funzionare male.
